response: the european union has been taking steps to protect user data and privacy in the digital age. the general data protection regulation (gdpr) was implemented in may 2018, which gives users more control over their data. companies and organizations that fail to comply with these regulations may face heavy fines. facebook is also facing lawsuits for its alleged misuse of user information. the social media platform is now focusing on creating a safe environment for users while also respecting their privacy. users can choose what personal information they want to share with others, including advertisers.
